create_dm_yyyymm:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS bi_st.st_function_statistic_dm_yyyymm (
                                          `statis_date` int(9) NOT NULL,
                                          `hour` smallint(4) NOT NULL COMMENT '小时为-1，则统计的为天，小时存在具体到天的小时统计',
                                          `channel_id` smallint(4) NOT NULL COMMENT 'AppStore、同步推、91助手 等，目前渠道为-1（未知）',
                                          `app_plat_id` tinyint(4) NOT NULL COMMENT '安卓，IOS，PC，Web',
                                          `app_version_id` smallint(4) NOT NULL COMMENT '坐标应用的版本',
                                          `single_text_count` bigint(20) NOT NULL COMMENT '单聊文本数',
                                          `single_text_size` bigint(20) NOT NULL COMMENT '单聊文本大小',
                                          `single_picture_count` bigint(20) NOT NULL COMMENT '单聊图片数',
                                          `single_picture_size` bigint(20) NOT NULL COMMENT '单聊图片大小',
                                          `single_file_count` bigint(20) NOT NULL COMMENT '单聊文件数',
                                          `single_file_size` bigint(20) NOT NULL COMMENT '单聊文件大小',
                                          `single_short_voice_count` bigint(20) NOT NULL COMMENT '单聊短语音数',
                                          `single_short_voice_time` bigint(20) NOT NULL COMMENT '单聊短语音时长',
                                          `single_short_video_count` bigint(20) NOT NULL COMMENT '单聊短视频数',
                                          `single_short_video_time` bigint(20) NOT NULL COMMENT '单聊短视频时长',
                                          `single_voice_count` bigint(20) NOT NULL COMMENT '单聊语音通话数',
                                          `single_voice_time` bigint(20) NOT NULL COMMENT '单聊语音通话时长',
                                          `single_video_count` bigint(20) NOT NULL COMMENT '单聊视频通话数',
                                          `single_video_time` bigint(20) NOT NULL COMMENT '单聊视频通话时长',
                                          `group_text_count` bigint(20) NOT NULL COMMENT '群聊文本数',
                                          `group_text_size` bigint(20) NOT NULL COMMENT '群聊文本大小',
                                          `group_picture_count` bigint(20) NOT NULL COMMENT '群聊图片数',
                                          `group_picture_size` bigint(20) NOT NULL COMMENT '群聊图片大小',
                                          `group_file_count` bigint(20) NOT NULL COMMENT '群聊文件数',
                                          `group_file_size` bigint(20) NOT NULL COMMENT '群聊文件大小',
                                          `group_short_voice_count` bigint(20) NOT NULL COMMENT '群聊短语音数',
                                          `group_short_voice_time` bigint(20) NOT NULL COMMENT '群聊短语音时长',
                                          `group_short_video_count` bigint(20) NOT NULL COMMENT '群聊短视频数',
                                          `group_short_video_time` bigint(20) NOT NULL COMMENT '群聊短视频时长',
                                          INDEX `idx_st_function_statistic_dm_yyyymm` (`statis_date`,`hour`,`channel_id`,`app_plat_id`,`app_version_id`)
                                     ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
create_tmp_ds_yyyymmdd:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS bi_tmp.tmp_st_function_statistic_yyyymmdd (
                                          `statis_date` int(9) NOT NULL,
                                          `hour` smallint(4) NOT NULL COMMENT '小时为-1，则统计的为天，小时存在具体到天的小时统计',
                                          `channel_id` smallint(4) NOT NULL COMMENT 'AppStore、同步推、91助手 等，目前渠道为-1（未知）',
                                          `app_plat_id` tinyint(4) NOT NULL COMMENT '安卓，IOS，PC，Web',
                                          `app_version_id` smallint(4) NOT NULL COMMENT '坐标应用的版本',
                                          `single_text_count` bigint(20) NOT NULL COMMENT '单聊文本数',
                                          `single_text_size` bigint(20) NOT NULL COMMENT '单聊文本大小',
                                          `single_picture_count` bigint(20) NOT NULL COMMENT '单聊图片数',
                                          `single_picture_size` bigint(20) NOT NULL COMMENT '单聊图片大小',
                                          `single_file_count` bigint(20) NOT NULL COMMENT '单聊文件数',
                                          `single_file_size` bigint(20) NOT NULL COMMENT '单聊文件大小',
                                          `single_short_voice_count` bigint(20) NOT NULL COMMENT '单聊短语音数',
                                          `single_short_voice_time` bigint(20) NOT NULL COMMENT '单聊短语音时长',
                                          `single_short_video_count` bigint(20) NOT NULL COMMENT '单聊短视频数',
                                          `single_short_video_time` bigint(20) NOT NULL COMMENT '单聊短视频时长',
                                          `single_voice_count` bigint(20) NOT NULL COMMENT '单聊语音通话数',
                                          `single_voice_time` bigint(20) NOT NULL COMMENT '单聊语音通话时长',
                                          `single_video_count` bigint(20) NOT NULL COMMENT '单聊视频通话数',
                                          `single_video_time` bigint(20) NOT NULL COMMENT '单聊视频通话时长',
                                          `group_text_count` bigint(20) NOT NULL COMMENT '群聊文本数',
                                          `group_text_size` bigint(20) NOT NULL COMMENT '群聊文本大小',
                                          `group_picture_count` bigint(20) NOT NULL COMMENT '群聊图片数',
                                          `group_picture_size` bigint(20) NOT NULL COMMENT '群聊图片大小',
                                          `group_file_count` bigint(20) NOT NULL COMMENT '群聊文件数',
                                          `group_file_size` bigint(20) NOT NULL COMMENT '群聊文件大小',
                                          `group_short_voice_count` bigint(20) NOT NULL COMMENT '群聊短语音数',
                                          `group_short_voice_time` bigint(20) NOT NULL COMMENT '群聊短语音时长',
                                          `group_short_video_count` bigint(20) NOT NULL COMMENT '群聊短视频数',
                                          `group_short_video_time` bigint(20) NOT NULL COMMENT '群聊短视频时长',
                                          INDEX `idx_st_function_statistic_yyyymmdd` (`statis_date`,`hour`,`channel_id`,`app_plat_id`,`app_version_id`)
                                     ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
delete_yes_date: delete from bi_st.st_function_statistic_dm_yyyymm where 1=1 AND statis_date = ${statisDate}
selectSingle_textDsSql:
SELECT
                                        ifnull(`statis_date` ,- 1) as statis_date,
                                        ifnull(`hour` ,- 1) as hour,
                                        -1 as channel_id,
                                        ifnull(`app_plat_id` ,- 1) as app_plat_id,
                                        ifnull(`app_version_id` ,- 1) as app_version_id,
                                        sum(`message_count`) as `single_text_count`,
                                        sum(`content_size`) as `single_text_size`,
                                        0 as `single_picture_count`,
                                        0 as `single_picture_size`,
                                        0 as `single_file_count`,
                                        0 as `single_file_size`,
                                        0 as `single_short_voice_count`,
                                        0 as `single_short_voice_time`,
                                        0 as `single_short_video_count`,
                                        0 as `single_short_video_time`,
                                        0 as `single_voice_count`,
                                        0 as `single_voice_time`,
                                        0 as `single_video_count`,
                                        0 as `single_video_time`,
                                        0 as `group_text_count`,
                                        0 as `group_text_size`,
                                        0 as `group_picture_count`,
                                        0 as `group_picture_size`,
                                        0 as `group_file_count`,
                                        0 as `group_file_size`,
                                        0 as `group_short_voice_count`,
                                        0 as `group_short_voice_time`,
                                        0 as `group_short_video_count`,
                                        0 as `group_short_video_time`
                                    FROM
                                        bi_dw.dw_engine_message_log_dm_yyyymm
                                    WHERE
                                        1 = 1
                                    AND `statis_date` = ${store_id}
                                    AND `is_group` = 1
                                    AND (`message_type` =1 or `message_type` =6 or `message_type` =7 or `message_type` = 8)

                                            0 AS `single_file_size`,
                                            0 AS `single_short_voice_count`,
                                            0 AS `single_short_voice_time`,
                                            0 AS `single_short_video_count`,
                                            0 AS `single_short_video_time`,
                                            0 AS `single_voice_count`,
                                            0 AS `single_voice_time`,
                                            0 AS `single_video_count`,
                                            0 AS `single_video_time`,
                                            0 AS `group_text_count`,
                                            0 AS `group_text_size`,
                                            0 AS `group_picture_count`,
                                            0 AS `group_picture_size`,
                                            0 AS `group_file_count`,
                                            0 AS `group_file_size`,
                                            0 AS `group_short_voice_count`,
                                            0 AS `group_short_voice_time`,
                                            sum(`message_count`) AS `group_short_video_count`,
                                            0 AS `group_short_video_time`
                                        FROM
                                            bi_dw.dw_engine_message_log_dm_yyyymm
                                        WHERE
                                            1 = 1
                                        AND `statis_date` = ${store_id}
                                        AND `is_group` = 2
                                        AND `message_type` = 5
